TopicTitle: TheAstroNut's Working Replica Viper Mk 1 from Battlestar Galactica

Articles.Content:
A replica ship of the Viper mk 1. Warp capable and very fast, uses KSP Interstellar Mod.

Screenshot of it burning into a higher orbit around Kerbin:

Download:

Viper mk1.craft

Usage note: extend the front landing gear before you drop the viper or the viper will either snap or the front landing gear will extend when you retract your landing gear.

Mods nessisary:

KSP interstellar mod (non-overpowered extra engines and power generators etc).

KAS (for the tether point at the nose)

Warrenty void if:

combat landing is attempted (will probably rip off nose gear).

exposed to air (will most likely take a liking to flying upside-down randomly).

nuked.

Edited October 15, 2013 by TheAstronut
Renaming thread
Lovely! One of the best I have seen! Can you offer a download?

Very nice!

All we need now is a Cylon Raider.
Awesome! Have you tried to put the GAU 19 on this yet?

no, besides the original didn't have a gattling gun so it wouldn't be accurate.

Edit:

Post a video of yourself taking it somewhere!

Edited October 15, 2013 by TheAstronut
Oh ok well are you considering a Mk II? Or is this the only Viper you are making?

I'm trying to figure out which ships I can do and how, it's hard to acurately replicate ships, this design came to me in a flash of inspiration while designing another ship, so i scrapped that one and made this one.

Make sure to post videos and screenshots of you flying it!

Edit: no part clipping was used in the making of this ship.

Edited October 15, 2013 by TheAstronut
If anyone wants to do a battlestar galactica themed ksp youtube show, i'll be happy to make ships for them.
